data.comment: Bruno Arleu starts the match. Corinthians with the kick-off in Porto Alegre.
Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
In the minute 4, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Gremio.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 7, Gremio's Pepe attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena do Gremio.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Corinthians.
In the minute 9, Bruno Arleu awards Gremio a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 15, Gremio's Alisson is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 18, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match at Arena do Gremio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Luis Orejuela, who is down injured.
Bruno Arleu signals a Corinthians throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 21, Attention is being given to Corinthiansâ€™s Michel and play has been suspended briefly.
Gremio have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 23, Gremio's Luis Orejuela is back in action after a slight knock.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Michel has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 25, Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
Pepe (Gremio) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Free kick Gremio.
In the minute 27, In Porto Alegre Gremio attack through Pedro Geromel. The finish is off target, however.
Bruno Arleu awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Corinthians at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Gremio.
Mateus Vital is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 31, Corinthians needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
Mateus Vital returns to the field for Corinthians after picking up a slight injury.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luan of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Angelo Araos (Corinthians) has replaced the possibly injured Mateus Vital at Arena do Gremio.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Gabriel (Corinthians) has received a yellow card from Bruno Arleu.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 39, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Pepe, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 42, Pepe for Gremio is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 45, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Gremio's Alisson gets in a shot on goal at Arena do Gremio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Walter Kannemann (Gremio) gets a yellow card.
Gremio have kicked-off the second half at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 48, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Arena do Gremio.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Corinthians.
In the minute 51, Gremio have a goal kick.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Jo (Corinthians) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 55, In Porto Alegre Gremio drive forward through Alisson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Bruno Arleu waits before resuming play because Cassio for Corinthians is still down.
Corinthians's Cassio looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Jean Pyerre gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gremio.
Free kick Corinthians.
In the minute 62, Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Throw-in Gremio.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 64, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Corinthians's area.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Gremio have a dangerous throw-in.
Gremio's Jean Pyerre misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 68, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In Porto Alegre, Diego Souza (Gremio) misses the target with a header.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Gremio.
Gremio attack but Walter Kannemann's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 71, Gremio apply pressure at Arena do Gremio and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Jean Pyerre but the strike hits the bar!
Gremio are pushing forward but Pepe's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Bruno Arleu awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Penalty! Bruno Arleu points to the spot, great chance for Gremio...
In the minute 77, At Arena do Gremio, Matheus Henrique has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Bruno Arleu awards Gremio a penalty but Diego Souza misses from 12 yards.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Gil (Corinthians) has received a first yellow card.
In Porto Alegre, Michel of Corinthians is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
The away team replace Ramiro with Ruan de Oliveira.
Bruno Arleu signals a Gremio throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
Ederson is on a sub for Luan for Corinthians.
In the minute 80, Isaque is replacing Jean Pyerre for the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 81, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Pepe of Gremio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick in a good position for Gremio!
In the minute 85, Lucas Silva is replacing Maicon for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a third substitution, with Thaciano replacing Diego Souza.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 86, Gremio's Lucas Silva gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Bruno Arleu awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 89, Alisson for Gremio drives towards goal at Arena do Gremio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Arleu will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
The away team have replaced Victor Cantillo with Leo Natel. This is the fourth substitution made today by Tiago Nunes.
Tiago Nunes is making the team's fifth substitution at Arena do Gremio with Guilherme Camacho replacing Gabriel.
Leo Natel (Corinthians) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
